sections.heading: 1. Introduction
sections.content: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website.

sections.heading: 2. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect your name, email address, phone number, shipping address, and payment details when you make a purchase or sign up for our services.

sections.heading: 3. Use of Information
sections.content: We use your information to fulfill orders, provide customer support, improve our services, and communicate relevant offers.

sections.heading: 4. Data Protection
sections.content: We implement secure systems and encryption to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

sections.heading: 5. Third-Party Services
sections.content: We may use trusted third-party services (e.g., payment gateways, logistics providers) who have their own privacy policies.

sections.heading: 6. Your Rights
sections.content: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us.

sections.heading: 7. Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this policy occasionally. The revised version will be posted on this page with a new effective date.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing our site or placing an order, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully before using our services.

sections.heading: 2. Product Information
sections.content: We strive for accuracy in product descriptions, pricing, and availability. We reserve the right to correct errors and update information.

sections.heading: 3. Orders and Payments
sections.content: Orders are considered confirmed once payment is received. We use secure payment gateways such as Razorpay.

sections.heading: 4. Shipping and Delivery
sections.content: Shipping timelines are estimates. We are not liable for delays caused by third-party logistics partners.

sections.heading: 5. Cancellations and Returns
sections.content: Please refer to our Return Policy page for details. Items must be returned in original condition within the return window.

sections.heading: 6. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages arising from the use of our platform.

sections.heading: 7. Governing Law
sections.content: These terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes shall be resolved in the jurisdiction of our registered office.

sections.heading: 1. Returns & Exchanges
sections.content: We offer a 1-year warranty on all products for manufacturing defects and damages during delivery. In case of damage, please contact us within 24 hours at support@goldenparadisefurniture.in or +91-7838834141. Exchanges are applicable only if the product is damaged and reported within 24 hours.

sections.heading: 2. Cancellations & Refunds
sections.content: Orders can be canceled only if they have not been processed. Refunds are issued for damaged or incorrect products if reported within 7 days of delivery. Items must be unused and returned in original condition along with a receipt.

sections.heading: 3. Delivery Policies
sections.content: Products are made-to-order and shipped within 7 working days. Multiple items may be shipped separately. We will notify you in case of delays or back-orders.

sections.heading: 4. Damage in Transit (Outside Delhi/NCR)
sections.content: Customers must inspect items upon delivery. If damage is found, it must be reported to the delivery partner and returned in the same truck. Failing to do so voids the return/exchange warranty.

sections.heading: 5. Shipping Charges
sections.content: Shipping is free across India. However, customers are responsible for any additional charges such as ODA (Out-of-Delivery Area), fuel surcharge, GST, or state-specific levies. Delivery is made to ground floor only.

sections.heading: 6. Warranty Coverage
sections.content: A 12-month warranty covers manufacturing defects under normal use. It does not cover wear and tear, self-damage, water exposure, fabric wear, or natural changes in solid wood (like minor cracks or grain lines).

sections.heading: 7. Refund Processing
sections.content: Once the return is received and inspected, weâ€™ll notify you of the approval. If approved, the refund will be issued to your original payment method. Please allow several business days for it to reflect in your account.

sections.heading: 1. Shipping Timeline
sections.content: All our products are made-to-order and are typically shipped within 7 working days of order confirmation.

sections.heading: 2. Shipping Charges
sections.content: We offer free shipping across most regions in India. However, additional charges such as ODA (Out-of-Delivery-Area) fees, fuel surcharges, odd-dimension handling charges, and applicable GST will be borne by the customer.

sections.heading: 3. Delivery Details
sections.content: Deliveries are made to the ground floor of the building only. If the delivery vehicle cannot reach your doorstep due to narrow lanes or restrictions, you must collect the item from the nearest accessible point.

sections.heading: 4. Delivery Locations
sections.content: We deliver across India, including Tier 1, Tier 2, and Tier 3 cities. Remote regions and northeastern states may be subject to additional charges and extended delivery timelines.

sections.heading: 5. Delivery Partners
sections.content: We work with trusted logistics partners to ensure safe and timely delivery of your furniture.

sections.heading: 6. Delivery Communication
sections.content: Customers will receive updates on order status and tracking details once the product has been shipped. If any delay occurs, we will inform you within 7 working days of your order.

sections.heading: 7. Contact Us
sections.content: For any shipping or delivery-related queries, please contact us at Furnishworld0@gmail.com or call us at +91 92057 53225.
